EmailTemplate.name: Uniform Sale
EmailTemplate.subject: Uniform Sale 4th September 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
Please be reminded of the Uniform Sale tomorrow, Thursday 4th September from 8:15 - 9:00am in the Lower Campus dance studio (in basement) (click here to download flyer). The sale is for Lower Campus AND Upper Campus clothing.
Thank you,
Admissions Office The International School of Moscow World Class Education
